name: pnp-list-formatting-announcements
title: Announcements
shortDescription: This sample formats your view to look like a Announcements card with a similiar style to Viva Connection Cards when on a SharePoint Page. In Microsoft Lists it will also show an image that you can connect with the Announcement.
longDescription: This sample formats your view to look like a Announcements card with a similiar style to Viva Connection Cards when on a SharePoint Page. In Microsoft Lists it will also show an image that you can connect with the Announcement.

references.name: Use view formatting to customize SharePoint
references.description: You can use view formatting to customize how items in SharePoint lists and libraries are displayed. To do this, you construct a JSON object that describes the elements that are displayed when an item is loaded in a view and any styles to be applied to those elements.
